name: Meridian Surgical Partners
overview: Meridian Surgical Partners, LLC, an ambulatory surgery center company, aligns with physicians in the acquisition, development, and management of multi-specialty ambulatory surgery centers and surgical hospitals in the United States. The company partners with physician-owned ambulatory surgery centers; physicians who want to develop new ambulatory surgery centers; and physicians who require assistance to optimize their facilitiesâ€™ financial performance. It also operates a portal that provides enterprise-wide reference, workflow, analysis, and documentation. Meridian Surgical Partners, LLC was founded in 2006 and is based in Brentwood, Tennessee. It has facilities in Battle Creek, Michigan; Cleburne, Texas; Coral Gables and Stuart, Florida; Arcadia, California; Greensburg, Pennsylvania; Omaha, Nevada; Eugene, Oregon; and Belleville, Illinois.
